# Comercial PWA 
:link: [Live Version](https://supreme-octo-guacamole-cloting.herokuapp.com/)  <img src="https://cdn.iconscout.com/icon/free/png-512/heroku-225989.png" width="32" height="32" /> 
## Preview
<p align="center">
<img src="https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/840043143314669578/866069113612402708/Animation.gif">
</p>

 
## Description

* Client on React
* Server on Express
* Database on Firestore
* Payment Processing on Stripe
